CustomField.formula: CASE( Status__c, "New", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154K0000009yoe", "New"), "Assigned", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154K0000009yob", "Assigned"), "In Progress", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154K0000009yod", "In Progress"), "On Hold", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154K0000009yof", "On Hold"), "Awaiting Response", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154K0000009yog", "Awaiting Response"), "Updated", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154K0000009yog", "Updated"), "Completed", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154K0000009yoc", "Completed"), "Rejected", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154K0000009yoa", "Rejected"), "Aborted", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154K0000009yoa", "Aborted"), "Roadmap", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154K0000009yof", "Roadmap"), "")
CustomField.label: Icon
